reporter_caption.center: AMERICAN TRADING COMPANY, INC. v. FISH, 50 A.D.2d 764 [1st Dept 1975]

caption.center: AMERICAN TRADING COMPANY, INC., Appellant, v. LEONARD FISH, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text:
Order and judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on June 6, 1974, and on or about October 23, 1974, unanimously affirmed for the reasons stated by Fein, J., at IC Part IX, and that the respondent recover of the appellant $60 costs and disbursements of this appeal. No opinion. [78 Misc.2d 210.]
Concur â€” Murphy, J.P., Lupiano, Capozzoli, Lane and Nunez, JJ.
